ing: 1/2 cup granular sucralose sweetener (such as SplendaÂ®)
des: "An easy, filling breakfast with no fruit. Can enjoy on the way to work!"
ins: Place tofu, yogurt, almond milk, sweetener, cashews, and vanilla extract in a blender. Blend on grind setting until cashews are mostly broken. Select liquefy setting; add ice and blend until smooth. Pour smoothie into 2 tall glasses and sip through straws.
